entry.title: Latest News from ROC
entry.content:
Billable Mileage

Billable Mileage is the latest app from ROC Solutions Inc.

Other Apps

ROC Memory 2 is a memory game fun for adults and challengin for kids.

Pocket Tuner is a simple guitar tuner app, which allows you to tune your guitar when a tuner is not available.

As always, suggestions for projects are welcome! If you’ve sent me suggestions chances are you need to fill out your README more, or you’re queued up for a future article. For the next edition I’d love to focus on neat open source desktop apps, so if you know of any feel free to send them along.
